items.sentence: Why don\'t we settle the matter once and for all?
I hear a lot of girls wear bikinis at that beach.
I heard that you ate steak for dinner last night.
I heard that you had a date with Tom. How was it?
I just wanted to know what time Tom would arrive.
I\'ll put the kettle on and we\'ll have some tea.
As soon as Tom finished eating, he left for work.
Be careful not to make your decision too quickly.
Can I go with you the next time you go to Boston?
Can you drive me to the airport tomorrow morning?
